A neat proof of the Cauchy criterion

I took introductory analysis with Understanding Analysis by Stephen Abbott, and I think it is great for the purpose of a first course in real analysis. However, now that I’ve done a bit more in analysis, I’ve started to revisit some of the important proofs of the textbook with simpler (albeit more developed) alternatives.
